QuestData.Title: Pyrewood's Fall
QuestData.Description: The attacks against our front are a distraction. With our attention turned towards the worgen onslaught, the Alliance has managed to take Pyrewood Village from our occupying forces.$B$B<Godfrey hands you a bundle of torches.>$B$BIt must be purged.$B$BWith these torches we will burn Pyrewood Village to the ground, leaving only ashes for the enemy to hide behind.$B$BLet us not waste another minute. Pyrewood Village is located southwest of the Forsaken Front. Lead us there, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bundle of Torches to torch the Pyrewood Town Hall, Pyrewood Inn and Pyrewood Chapel.
QuestData.RewardText: The part of me that was Gilnean died at Tempest's Reach. Only vengeance remains, $n. To that end, we have work to do. Spare me your pointless queries.
